Content: Employees of the Pugoda Textile Factory were awarded compensation after 19 years. About 2300 workers were serving in the Government owned Pugoda Factory at the time of its closure. The Finance Ministry decided to pay their salary arrears. Accordingly the payment of the related compensation took place recently at the auditorium of the Dompe Divisional Secretariat. Noteworthy was the participation of officials other than any political representatives. The workers expressed their appreciation to the Government for the awarding of compensation to them after several years.
